title: Quiplash 2 InterLASHional
notes: Steam reviews are Very Positive (92% of 323). Metacritic has two critic reviews (80–82), supporting a high blended score.
raw_comment: Party game with phones or tablets as controllers for 3-8 players. Content in French, Italian, German, Spanish, and English. English content is identical to Quiplash 2, found in Jackbox Party Pack 3.
